documentation.text:
@title Splitter
  Splitter is a contract where amounts sent to this contract are split between two recipients
@dev Recipients can withdraw their amount locked in the contract

@title Splitter
  Splitter is a contract where amounts sent to this contract are split between two recipients
@dev Recipients can withdraw their amount locked in the contract

split(address,address).details: Amount attached to the transaction are splitted between recipient1 and recipient2      Any remaining amount remains with the sender

params.recipient1: The address of the first recipient
params.recipient2: The address of the second recipient

withdraw().details: Recipients can withdraw their amount locked in the contract
